title: connecting to chat....
body: so any help ive googled my little heart out and nothing is working, the first game runs fine then after that very game connecting to chat... and never does, if I wait in the lobby for like 30 mins or restart my client It fixes itself but other then that and I don't feel like I should have to restart my client after every game. and it also fucks up the ingame chat so I cant communicate in game and I'm even wondering if pings are working.

replies.body: Hmmmm you definitely shouldn't need to be restarting your client after each match just to be able to talk. Since the chat servers are different than the game servers, your client might have something blocking it's connection to those chat servers. Let's take a few minutes to go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you can get a solid link to chat.
